sourcesContent:
employee-registration works!

Add Employee





import { Component } from '@angular/core'; interface Manager { id: number; name: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-registration', templateUrl: './employee-registration.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-registration.component.css'] }) export class EmployeeRegistrationComponent { managers: Manager[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'John Doe' }, { id: 2, name: 'Jane Smith' }, { id: 3, name: 'Bob Johnson' }, ]; addEmployee() { const name = (document.getElementById('name') as HTMLInputElement).value; const email = (document.getElementById('email') as HTMLInputElement).value; const password = (document.getElementById('password') as HTMLInputElement).value; const managerId = (document.getElementById('reporting-manager') as HTMLSelectElement).value; // Perform employee registration logic here console.log('Name:', name); console.log('Email:', email); console.log('Password:', password); console.log('Reporting Manager ID:', managerId); } }
